Class MemberService

java.lang.Object
application.MemberService
public class MemberService extends Object
Provides services and business logic related to library members.

Connects the presentation layer with the data layer (MemberRepository) and handles operations such as member registration, authentication, removal, and retrieval.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MemberService()
    Creates a MemberService with no repository configured.
    MemberService(MemberRepository repository)
    Creates a MemberService with the given repository.

      Registers a new member.
      Parameters:
      member - the member to register
      Returns:
      true on success, false if already exists, null on invalid input

      Removes an existing member.
      Parameters:
      member - the member to remove
      Returns:
      true on success, false if not found, null on invalid input

    • login

      public boolean login(String userName, String password)
      Attempts to log in a member.
      Parameters:
      userName - the member username/email
      password - the member password
      Returns:

    • logout

      public Boolean logout(String userName)
      Logs out a member.
      Parameters:
      userName - the member username/email
      Returns:
      true if the member transitioned to OFFLINE; false otherwise; null on invalid input
